name: PDFXStandards
shortdesc: Options for specifying the PDF/X compliance standard.

property.name: NONE
property.shortdesc: Does not check for compliance with a PDF/X standard.

property.name: PDFX1A2001_STANDARD
property.shortdesc: Checks for compliance with the PDF/X-1a:2001 standard.

property.name: PDFX32002_STANDARD
property.shortdesc: Checks for compliance with the PDF/X-3:2002 standard.

property.name: PDFX1A2003_STANDARD
property.shortdesc: Checks for compliance with the PDF/X-1a:2003 standard.

property.name: PDFX32003_STANDARD
property.shortdesc: Checks for compliance with the PDF/X-3:2003 standard.
